title: baby2020
author: baby2020
content: (1) CHAINEDGE_IO - Tells you what smart money is buying (2) DEXSCREENER -Finds early projects(3) Zerion - Tracks over 1000 whale wallets(4) BananaGUNBot - snipes trades early and faster (5) Maestrobot- removes buying complication by buying with telegram(6) alphador_ai - analyses tokens that whales are in after tokens is created (7) TheYardTools- analyses volume traders, detects when liquidity is burnt and detects snipers

comments.author: CP9-Black
comments.body: I'll save it first, then see if it's useful or not at all.Thanks

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: If you place the links so that they can be clicked, it will make it easier to browse the list. I started trying the first service, which is https://app.chainedge.io/, and found that it is a paid service. There is no trial or free version for a limited time, and the subscription is very expensive.600 dollars a year or 50 dollars a month is very expensive for a beginner who is comfortable making a profit and after purchasing the package there is no profitable and guaranteed trading.DEXSCREENER seems like a good service, but there are thousands of new projects and it is not easy to know which of these projects has value, and many of the projects are similar.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: baby2020 on October 27, 2023, 05:32:33 PM(1) CHAINEDGE_IO - Tells you what smart money is buying (2) DEXSCREENER -Finds early projects(3) Zerion - Tracks over 1000 whale wallets(4) BananaGUNBot - snipes trades early and faster (5) Maestrobot- removes buying complication by buying with telegram(6) alphador_ai - analyses tokens that whales are in after tokens is created (7) TheYardTools- analyses volume traders, detects when liquidity is burnt and detects snipers Thanks for the assembly, however, let me also add that these will also need some level of technical knowledge also as a totally zero-technical skilled trader cannot deploy them to use successfully. Everyone in the crypto space should consider himself a student. If  money must be made, then lessons must be learnt and  steady update is required.
